metricsHealthEndpointToken.description: The token allowing access to the metrics and health endpoints

hostedMetricsBaseUri.description: The Grafana hosted metrics base URI where metrics are flushed

hostedMetricsApiKeyStaging.description: The Grafana hosted metrics API Key to use for the staging environment

hostedMetricsApiKeyProduction.description: The Grafana hosted metrics API Key to use for the production environment

slackWebhookUrlStaging.description: The Slack Webhook URL for health check alerting for the staging environment

slackWebhookUrlProduction.description: The Slack Webhook URL for health check alerting for the production environment
